apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully illustrates a couple with a heart, featuring a man with a medium-dark skin tone and another man with a medium skin tone, all rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting. Their figures are designed with soft rounded edges, conveying a sense of warmth and gentle affection as they are united by a prominent, richly colored heart. This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, serves as a vibrant and inclusive symbol of romantic love and partnership between two men, perfect for expressing deep care and celebrating relationships in digital communications.
